description: Substantial Romano-Celtic temple located near Wymondham, Norfolk on undulating ground. Chronology is uncertain.
bibliography: Clarke, R. R. “Roman Britain in 1959.” Journal of Roman Studies 50 (1960): 228.
EAA 175: Crownthorpe: A Boudican Hoard of Bronze Vessels from Early Roman Norfolk, 2021.
Martyn, Blick, Brindle, and et al. “Crownthorpe, Wicklewood (Norfolk).” The Rural Settlement of Roman Britain: an online resource, 2015. https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449.
